definition: extra/surplus/remaining/remainder after division/(following numerical value) or more/in excess of (some number)/residue (math.)/after/I/me

sentences.english: If you desire full redundancy, order option 002.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要完全冗余，则订购选项002。

sentences.english: Consider the use of offsite data centers for redundancy.
sentences.chinese: 考虑使用非现场数据中心来实现冗余。

sentences.english: In this paper, a concept of the degree of observable redundancy is proposed.
sentences.chinese: 本文提出了状态完全可观冗余度的概念。

sentences.english: A new method for removing redundant points from 3D scattered point sets is presented.
sentences.chinese: 提出了一种剔除空间散乱点集中冗余点的新方法。

sentences.english: Research on problem of data redundancy in wide area sensor databases;
sentences.chinese: 该方案具有强不可伪造性，且签名结果不含冗余数据。

sentences.english: Survivability is provided by redundant hot-swappable power supplies and fans.
sentences.chinese: 通过冗余的热插拔电源和风扇提供可用性。

sentences.english: Normalization eliminates redundancies in the data and organizes the data efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 标准化消除了数据冗余，并对数据进行有效的组织。

sentences.english: This means that it has some redundancies.
sentences.chinese: 这意味着它将具有某些冗余。

sentences.english: This can have the desirable effect of reducing redundant declarations.
sentences.chinese: 这样可以产生减少冗余声明这种令人满意的效果。

sentences.english: How about applications with built-in redundancy?
sentences.chinese: 那具有内置冗余性的应用程序呢？

sentences.english: Finally, simulation results of a planar 3R redundant manipulator are given.
sentences.chinese: 最后用平面3R冗余度机械臂进行了计算仿真。

sentences.english: Dr Wang's starting point is the redundancy of the genetic code used by nucleic acids.
sentences.chinese: 他的出发点是核酸遗传密码的冗余性。

sentences.english: Such deployment of redundant capacity has additional network overhead and costs.
sentences.chinese: 冗余容量的这种部署有附加的网络开销和成本。

sentences.english: Left and right air-flue gas paths do not share redundant processors.
sentences.chinese: 左右烟道气路径不共享冗余处理器。

sentences.english: A second drawback of a pure device is that it does not filter any redundant state changes.
sentences.chinese: 纯设备的第二个缺点是它不会滤除任何冗余状态变化。

sentences.english: To Combination Topology, Bridge-Port redundancy method has been proposed.
sentences.chinese: 针对混合拓扑提出了桥端口冗余结构。

definition: to be clogged up/to be congested (traffic, computer network etc)
